title: (x) Vogue Pattern geometric sans - Futura {Conor}
content:
Hi guys:

It looks Avant Garde but its not. And its not Penumbra either. It's not very easy to be vogue.

Thanks for helping,

Mikey

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100224082405im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Vogue9846_6480.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100224082405im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Vogue9851_4839.JPG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100224082405im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Vogue9569_5364.JPG)
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content: Are you off kicking yourself Mike?

Conor\>\>\> I want to shoot myself...DUH!!!! Futura!!!!

Thanks Conor you rock!!!!

Ooooooh, almost as embarassing as my Verdana slip recently. :^D

[One of us, one of us, one of us ...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100224082405/http:/imdb.com/title/tt0022913/)
This reminds me of the time I was looking for the toothbrush and I had it in my hand.

You’re welcome Mike.

Not as bad as _“where are my spectacles?”_ and finding them on your nose.

;^)
